name: Gazpacho With Lobster And Shrimp
keywords: appetizer, main course, jalapeño, kirby cucumber, lobster tails, red bell pepper, red onion, shrimp, tomato, tomato juice, summer
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and ground black pepper
4 to 5 Kirby cucumbers with seeds, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Smash garlic clove with the flat of a heavy knife, cover with salt, and let sit 5 minutes. Work into a paste by alternately chopping it and mashing it with flat of knife. In a large bowl, combine garlic, onion, bell peppers, cucumbers, tomatoes, jalapeño, tomato juice and lemon juice, and stir. Season to taste. Allow gazpacho to sit for 2 hours before serving.
To serve, slice lobster tails into 1/4-inch medallions. Slice shrimp in half lengthwise. Ladle soup into bowls, garnish with shellfish and sprinkle with chives.
